control.description-key: An advanced textarea control that supports submitting text by pressing the Enter key.

property.name: Value
property.description-key: The current value of the textarea.

property.name: EventStatus
property.description-key: Event that is triggered when the Enter key is pressed.

property.name: PlaceholderText
property.description-key: The placeholder text displayed in the textarea when its empty.

property.name: FontSize
property.description-key: The font size of the textarea text.

property.name: FontFamily
property.description-key: The font family of the textarea text.

property.name: BorderRadius
property.description-key: The border radius of the textarea.

property.name: MaxLength
property.description-key: Maximum number of characters allowed in the textarea.

property.name: DelayedOutput
property.description-key: If set to true, onChange event will be executed only after the user loses focus from the control. If set to false, onChange event will be executed on every keypress.
